title: NEWLY RENOVATED HOME READY for MOVE IN, MUST SEE! Section 8 ok
posting_body: ['Property Status as of 08/01/2022:', 'Showings Everyday - Call or text to make appointment', 'Also accepting Section 8', 'Available For Rent: Single Family Home Address: 626 E Nugent St, Lancaster, CA 93535 Lease Term: One Year Unit Info: 4bed2bath with 1227 sq ft. Lease Rate: $2,895.00 Deposit $2,900.00 Utilities Included: None - Tenant Pays for All Refrigerator: Not Included Microwave: Included Stove: Included Parking: Driveway/Garage Washer/Dryer:', 'Hookups available Listing Broker Carlos Garcia OPTIONAL PET monthly rent: $50.00 (each pet) Newly Renovated Spacious 4 bed 2 bath single story home ready for immediate occupancy.', 'New Upgrades includes ZERO-scape landscape, NEW Central AC/Heat, new cement spacious driveway, new cement in backyard for entertaining, double pane windows, new tile floor throughout the home that resembles the look of "hardwood" planks, freshly painted, newer stove, new kitchen cabinets, new quartz counters.', 'Both bathrooms have also been remodel with tiled shower walls and a newer vanity in the hall bathroom.', "APPROVAL DOCUMENTATION REQUIRED for W2 hourly employees: Prospective applicants MUST be able to proof their income and provide a combined income of 2.5x the amount of rent AFTER everyone's monthly obligations and deductions have been calculated.", 'Applicants must have a strong, established fico score with no evictions and no derogatory marks on their credit history.', 'Current PAYSTUB + 3 months bank statements must be submitted (additional documentation may be required to complete the application).', 'APPROVAL DOCUMENTATION REQUIRED for SELF EMPLOYED/FREELANCE:', "Prospective self employed applicants MUST be able to proof their income and provide a combined income of 3x the amount of rent AFTER everyone's monthly obligations and deductions have been calculated.", 'Applicants must have a strong, established fico score with no evictions and no derogatory marks on their credit history.', 'Required for self employed/freelance is Signed/Filed Tax Return for 2021 and 12 months bank statements.', 'Failure to provide BOTH of the required documents will be an automatic denial.', 'No exceptions, if you are self employed or freelance you are required to file income taxes and provide proof of income.(additional documentation may be required to complete the application).', 'Section 8 Accepted']
